alert.note: Alert for Nicholas; Robertson (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 18 at 11:19AM EST until February 19 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Kentucky... Licking River at Blue Licks Spring affecting Robertson and Nicholas Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Licking River at Blue Licks Spring. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Cropland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 25.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 25.5 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 25.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 25.6 feet on 02/21/2019. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio and your local media for the latest information. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lmk. The next statement will be issued this evening.
